dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: What pitiful creature dares to wander into the realm of Gloomshade, the bringer of eternal shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Aerin Stormbringer, Guardian of the Sacred Grove. I seek to restore balance to Mystic Haven.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A Guardian? Hah! Your feeble attempts at restoration will be in vain, for darkness shall consume all in its path.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be intimidated by your empty threats. Face me, shadow wraith!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare challenge me? Prepare to be engulfed by the shadows forever!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand my ground and fight until the end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, your bravery will be your downfall. Taste the darkness' embrace!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense your malevolent presence, but I will not succumb to fear. I choose to retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! A coward as expected. Flee while you can, but know that darkness will always find you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the power you wield, but I believe there is still a glimmer of light within you. Let us find common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light and shadow shall never unite. You are deluded to think otherwise. Prepare to face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down from my conviction. Let us strive for understanding and cooperation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your naivety is astounding. Embrace the shadows' embrace, for it is all that awaits you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see that you are beyond reason. I choose to leave you in your darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you cower away, know that the shadows will forever haunt your every step.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking to uncover the mysteries that lie within Mystic Haven. Will you allow me to pass?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? There is no peace for those who trespass into the realm of shadows. Leave now or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect the boundaries you guard. I shall retreat and seek knowledge elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. Leave this place and never return if you value your feeble existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be turned away so easily. I will stay and learn from the darkness itself.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Your curiosity will be your downfall. Embrace the shadows' embrace!
